actions.grids_actions_html: array with all record data * $this => native CodeIgniter instance (usefull to execute queries, get input vars, session data, etc...) * * Placeholders * {value_id} => current record id * {base_url} => baseurl (ends with "/") * * Example 1: * text * * Example 2: * debug($row_data); //This will generate a print_r/var_dump of the record (usefull when you want to detect all keys available in $row_data * echo($this->auth->get('users_id')); //Print id of the current logged user */ ?>
